long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables seamless framing of web pages by bypassing X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy HTTP response headers

Drops X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy HTTP response headers, allowing all pages to be I framed.

No custom options or installation instructions: just install the extension and enable it on the relevant websites using the standard browser controls.

Reference:
* https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/X-Frame-Options
* https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Content-Security-Policy
